com.ivj.squirrelgame.board

Class BoardConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ivj.squirrelgame.board.BoardConfig

  • public class BoardConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class saves a configuration for a Board class with constants like width, height.
